message.body: Are you around this week? I'm coming to philly wed or Thursday.
Oooh yes! I am nannying and babysitting unfortunately until wed but I think I might be free during day too/ text me when you're here? You can def crash at my place tho even if I'm not there
Sorry I never replied about the ny trip- I wasn't sure if I could but I def can't now
I've been insanely busy and it's been awful lol
Im exhausted all the time
Haha I'm sorry these kids woke me up at 7:30am and I'm still bitter
Awww. Sorry your so busy! I'll let you know when I know for sure. So, you would be available Thursday?
Ok. We'll stay in touch. I'll come soon. I have my money:) wanted to give you what I owe you
Maybe ...their parents return Thursday evening but I might be totally exhausted by then so I don't want to make promises ; I will def try tho
Just the Constantly wanting to play omg go to bed go read a book oh wait you can't
They are overwhelming! I used to have to nap when they did
I can mail you a check too
Haha
It's only been half a day and I already feel like I've survived some kind of war

So, I really do want to buy another of your pieces if you have any to sell? Could you send me a photo of one or two that you think I would like? I truly admire your work and I can't imagine decorating my new apt without some. I'm so lucky

Also, if I send you check for what I owe you, plus interest, and a check for any artwork, can I pay to have the piece I bought + whatever I owe for another piece and have them shipped here? I can pay for shipping

Ok! I have a show coming up at the Crane though and I want to show all of my recent paintings. I will definitely let you know! I also interviewed to work full time at the fabric workshop museum and if I get that job, you and I should celebrate. It'll be nice not to juggle pt gallery work with Pt coffeeshop stuff :/
It will be so nice. You deserve that
I understand about your work. I feel bad that I'm not able to offer obscene amounts of money for them, like they are worth. Just know that I will truly treasure and showcase anything of yours.
Aw! Thanks! No worries! I have smaller, lower priced paintings
I'm showing with Brice actually which I'm happy about
I can't even daydream of my new apt, without including your paintings in the scheme
So I feel really good
Haha yay! I'm glad you won that $$
I think DC is a really good place for you
That's awesome, Ingrid!
For now
I eventually want to go west coast
Or europe
Where is your show?
Will you just send me some photos of what you think I might like and I can send the full check to you the beginning of the week?
And want to hear more about your show
